attributes.action: Make Personal Development Sessions in School Optional instead of Mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: This allows Students to use this time to study for lessons and focus on their GCSEs or A-levels. This would make for a higher average grade nationally as students have more time to support themselves in their studies.
attributes.background: Make Personal Development Sessions in School Optional instead of Mandatory

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to require students to take personal development sessions are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
